narrative.title: Provider Overview
narrative.text: Community Health and Counseling Services is a Community/Behavioral Health provider based in Bangor, ME. From the 2018–2024 period, this provider received $79.6M in Medicaid payments across 256K claims.

narrative.title: Why This Matters
narrative.text: At $79.6M in Medicaid payments, this provider represents significant public healthcare spending. Understanding where these dollars go helps ensure the program serves those who need it most.
